description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the secure boot security feature bypass vulnerability (CVE-2024-37987):

1. Download and apply the appropriate KB updates from the Microsoft Update Catalog based on your Windows version:
   - For Windows 11 Version 23H2: [KB5040442](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040442)
   - For Windows 11 Version 22H2: [KB5040442](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040442)
   - For Windows 11 Version 21H2: [KB5040431](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040431)
   - For Windows 10 Version 22H2: [KB5040427](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040427)
   - For Windows 10 Version 21H2: [KB5040427](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040427)

2. Restart your system after the installation of the KB updates to ensure the changes take effect.

**Details**:
This security update resolves a vulnerability involving a secure boot feature bypass, classified as having a maximum severity of 'important'. The updates aim to eliminate potential exploit pathways briefed in the vulnerability description. Backup relevant data and configurations before proceeding with the installation.
